DOC.brief_summary: This study examine feasibility , acceptability usability semi-quantitative urine pregnancy test ( dBest One Step hCG Panel Test Kit ) at-home follow-up early medical abortion use mifepristone+misoprostol . The study seek : 1 . Assess feasibility use test lieu standard one-week clinic-based follow determination complete abortion status part normal service delivery . In Mexico , follow two week , standard care . 2 . To determine woman use test home understand use correctly interpret result ; practical . 3 . Assess woman 's provider 's acceptability use at-home pregnancy test lieu clinic-based follow confirmation complete medical abortion future .
DOC.brief_title: Exploring Role At-home Semi-Quantitative Pregnancy Tests Medical Abortion Follow-up
DOC.criteria: Women age great equal 18 year Gestational age less equal 63 day last menstrual period ( LMP ) , ultrasound clinical assessment Agrees return followup visit willing provide address and/or telephone number purpose followup Able consent study participation . Inclusion Criteria Mexico : Gestational age < _ 70 day LMP Eligible mifepristone misoprostol medical abortion accord clinic guideline Willing follow instruction provider regard use athome pregnancy test Agrees provide test result phone study coordinator morning schedule followup visit Willing provide address and/or telephone number purpose followup Agrees return standard followup visit Wishes participate study Having easy access telephone transportation Able consent study participation Women le 18 year age Women eligible medical abortion service Women unable provide contact information Women unable sign consent form Exclusion Criteria Mexico : Women eligible medical abortion service Women unable provide contact information Women unable sign consent form
